Airplane Chime Timer - Elegant Airplane Chime Notifications for Aviation mania!

Airplane Chime Timer is a Chrome extension that brings the familiar and pleasant sound of airplane chimes(seat belt sign sound) to your browser, providing gentle time notifications without any visual interruptions.

Key Features and Benefits:

üìç Precise Time Notifications
- Customizable intervals: 
  Choose from preset intervals (15min, 30min, 1hour) or set your own custom interval in minutes.
- Specific time alarms: 
  Set alarms for particular times of day (e.g., 9:45 AM, 2:15 PM)
- Chimes exactly at :00 seconds (e.g., 15:00, 15:30, 16:00) or at your specified alarm times.
- Audio-only notifications - no distracting popups
- Perfect for time management without visual interruptions

üìç Authentic Airplane Sounds
- High-quality airplane chime recordings
- Multiple chime variations to choose from
- Support for custom sound uploads (MP3, WAV)
- Adjustable volume control
- Professional aviation ambiance

üìç User-Friendly Interface
- Simple ON/OFF toggle
- Easy interval selection and custom interval input
- Intuitive specific time alarm setup
- Intuitive volume slider
- Clear next chime time display
- Simple custom sound management

üìç Minimal and Efficient
- Runs silently in the background
- Low resource usage
- No visual distractions
- Automatic state preservation
- Secure custom sound storage

Technical Features:
- Chrome Manifest V3 compliant
- Precise timing system for accurate notifications
- Local storage for user preferences and custom sounds
- Efficient audio handling system
- Secure custom sound upload handling

FAQ:
Q: Will the chimes play even when my browser is in the background?
A: Yes, the chimes will play regardless of your active browser tab.

Q: Does it affect browser performance?
A: No, the extension is designed to be lightweight and efficient.

Q: Are the notifications visible?
A: No, it's audio-only by design to minimize distractions.

Q: Will my settings be saved when I close the browser?
A: Yes, all your preferences (volume, interval, selected chime, custom sounds, custom intervals, and specific time alarms) are automatically saved.

Q: Can I use my own sound files?
A: Yes, you can upload your own MP3 or WAV files (up to 1MB) to use as chime sounds.
